ai-patthana15.16:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma: allows unintelligent in the Khadehaka, that is to say, the Lord of the Death,
ai-patthana15.16:0.3_0: On its path, it condemns and so on.
ai-patthana15.16:1.1_0: for sure path does not arise with the path, nor does the cause or condition.
ai-patthana15.16:3.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
